倉.definition: barn; granary; storehouse; cabin; hold (in ship)

倉位.definition: (logistics) storage location; place to store goods; (finance) position

倉卒.definition: variant of 倉促|仓促[cang1 cu4]

倉山.definition: Cangshan, a district of Fuzhou City 福州市[Fu2zhou1 Shi4], Fujian

倉山區.definition: Cangshan, a district of Fuzhou City 福州市[Fu2zhou1 Shi4], Fujian

倉惶.definition: variant of 倉皇|仓皇[cang1 huang2]

倉敷.definition: Kurashiki, city in Okayama Prefecture 岡山縣|冈山县[Gang1 shan1 xian4], Japan

倉猝.definition: variant of 倉促|仓促[cang1 cu4]

倉皇出逃.definition: to run off in a great panic (idiom)

倉頡.definition: Cang Jie, legendary scribe of the Yellow Emperor and inventor of Chinese writing; (computing) Cangjie input method

倉黃.definition: variant of 倉皇|仓皇[cang1 huang2]
